name: Vegan Mocha Chocolate Cake with Salted Caramel drizzle
description: How to make a Moist Mocha Cake. Drizzled with vegan salted caramel. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup vanilla almond milk  (or non dairy milk plus a few drops of vanilla extract)
1.5 Tablespoon instant coffee (or substitute the 1/4 cup water above with 1/4 cup brewed coffee- preferably strong)
1/3 cup dark chocolate or semi sweet chocolate chips
1/2 cup Oat flour (Use wheat flour or AP flour for less crumbly cake)
1/4 cup raw sugar ground (you can also use other sweeteners like coconut sugar)
1 Tablespoon coconut milk or almond milk or non dairy milk

itemListElement.text: Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F.
itemListElement.name: Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F.

itemListElement.text: In a bowl, add all of the wet ingredients, mix and warm in the microwave, or on stove top until just about hot to touch.
itemListElement.name: In a bowl, add all of the wet ingredients, mix and warm in the microwave, or on stove top until just about hot to touch.

itemListElement.text: Add in the chocolate chips or bar, and whisk until chocolate melts and is well combined.
itemListElement.name: Add in the chocolate chips or bar, and whisk until chocolate melts and is well combined.

itemListElement.text: In another bowl, mix all the flours, cocoa powder, baking powder and salt. whisk well.
itemListElement.name: In another bowl, mix all the flours, cocoa powder, baking powder and salt. whisk well.

itemListElement.text: Add the dry to the wet.
itemListElement.name: Add the dry to the wet.

itemListElement.text: Pour batter in greased or parchment lined 8 inch pan.
itemListElement.name: Pour batter in greased or parchment lined 8 inch pan.

itemListElement.text: Bake at preheated 365 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.
itemListElement.name: Bake at preheated 365 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.

itemListElement.text: Cool for a few minutes, then remove from pan. Cool completely before slicing.
itemListElement.name: Cool for a few minutes, then remove from pan. Cool completely before slicing.

itemListElement.text: Before serving drizzle liberally with warm salted caramel!
itemListElement.name: Before serving drizzle liberally with warm salted caramel!

recipeInstructions.name: Vegan Salted Caramel Sauce: inspired by Chef Chloe's recipe

itemListElement.text: In a small saucepan, over medium heat, combine all ingredients( 1 Tablespoon coconut milk). stirring frequently. Once mixture comes together, increase heat to medium-high for 1 to 2 minutes, until it begins to boil and the bubbles move into the center of the caramel and it thickens just a little(a few more seconds). Remove from heat and let cool. Then pour this insanely delicious caramel over everything!
itemListElement.name: In a small saucepan, over medium heat, combine all ingredients( 1 Tablespoon coconut milk). stirring frequently. Once mixture comes together, increase heat to medium-high for 1 to 2 minutes, until it begins to boil and the bubbles move into the center of the caramel and it thickens just a little(a few more seconds). Remove from heat and let cool. Then pour this insanely delicious caramel over everything!

keywords: Chocolate and caramel, easy cake recipe, vegan chocolate cake
